knimeNode.name: Performance Checker
knimeNode.shortDescription: Based on the alignments after replaying, this node calculates the performance on time.

fullDescription.intro:
This node is based on the alignment result from PNReplayer, and calculates the performance information on Petri net. Usually, Strategy type of the previous replayer is A*-ILP Based Manifest Replayer.
At end, the performance information is given on tables, such as
global cases, transitions, and places of Petri net. Also, the performance projection on Petri net is shown in view.
More information seen in the : paper and codes.
fullDescription.option: The attribute is chosen as the complete time to calculate the performance. In default, it is set as the complete time. More choices will be seen in the future version.
Choose to include unreliable replay result in performance calculation. It is true in default.

ports.inPort: Input port for an event log
Input port for a Petri net
ports.outPort: It shows statistical performance of all cases from the event log. It focuses on the throughput time of cases. However, the global fitness information is also included.
It lists the throughput time, waiting time, and sojourn time for each transition from Petri net.
It lists the waiting time, synchronization time, and sojourn time for each place from Petri net.

views.view: Performance projected on Petri net. It accepts customized changes.
